Description data

Use the description data component to give more information about the content on the page, for example about a contact person, an entity or a publication.

Installation 

                  
                    npm i @govflanders/vl-ui-description-data

or 

                  
                    yarn add @govflanders/vl-ui-description-data

Usage

Import SASS 

                  
                  @import "vl-ui-description-data/src/scss/description-data";

Make sure your sass --include-path includes node_modules/@govflanders/.

Description data

Basic implementation of description data. Add the description-data--bordered class modifier to any of the variants to add a border top and bottom.

Uitgever Kind en Gezin
Publicatiedatum Augustus 2018
Publicatietype Brochure
Categorie Kinderen en jongeren 
      <div class="vl-description-data">
    <div class="vl-grid vl-grid--is-stacked"><div class="vl-col--1-4 vl-col--1-3--s vl-col--1-2--xs">
          <span class="vl-description-data__label">Uitgever</span>
          <span class="vl-description-data__value" itemprop="publisher" itemtype="http://schema.org/Organization">Kind en Gezin</span>
        </div><div class="vl-col--1-4 vl-col--1-3--s vl-col--1-2--xs">
          <span class="vl-description-data__label">Publicatiedatum</span>
          <span class="vl-description-data__value" itemprop="datePublished" content="Mon Aug 08 2016 00:00:00 GMT+0000 (Coordinated Universal Time)">Augustus 2018</span>
        </div><div class="vl-col--1-4 vl-col--1-3--s vl-col--1-2--xs">
          <span class="vl-description-data__label">Publicatietype</span>
          <span class="vl-description-data__value">Brochure</span>
        </div><div class="vl-col--1-4 vl-col--1-3--s vl-col--1-2--xs">
          <span class="vl-description-data__label">Categorie</span>
          <span class="vl-description-data__value" itemprop="about" itemtype="http://schema.org/Thing">Kinderen en jongeren</span>
        </div></div>
  </div>

Description data with icons

Label supported by an icon

Uitgever

Waterwegen en zeekanaal NV
duur

Contractueel onbepaalde duur
Doelgroep

Niveau A

 
      <div class="vl-description-data vl-description-data--bordered">
    <div class="vl-grid vl-grid--is-stacked"><div class="vl-col--1-4 vl-col--1-3--s vl-col--1-2--xs">
          <div class="vl-description-data__icon-wrapper">
            <i class="vl-description-data__icon vl-vi vl-vi-pin" aria-hidden="true"></i>
            <span class="vl-description-data__label">Uitgever</span>
            <span class="vl-description-data__value" itemprop="publisher" itemtype="http://schema.org/Organization"><p><a href="#">Waterwegen en zeekanaal NV</a></p>
</span>
          </div>
        </div><div class="vl-col--1-4 vl-col--1-3--s vl-col--1-2--xs">
          <div class="vl-description-data__icon-wrapper">
            <i class="vl-description-data__icon vl-vi vl-vi-clock" aria-hidden="true"></i>
            <span class="vl-description-data__label">duur</span>
            <span class="vl-description-data__value" itemprop="duration" itemtype="https://pending.schema.org/duration"><p>Contractueel onbepaalde duur</p>
</span>
          </div>
        </div><div class="vl-col--1-4 vl-col--1-3--s vl-col--1-2--xs">
          <div class="vl-description-data__icon-wrapper">
            <i class="vl-description-data__icon vl-vi vl-vi-graduate" aria-hidden="true"></i>
            <span class="vl-description-data__label">Doelgroep</span>
            <span class="vl-description-data__value" itemprop="audience" itemtype="http://schema.org/EducationalAudience"><p>Niveau A</p>
</span>
          </div>
        </div></div>
  </div>

Description data with subdata

Show primary data with optional subdata underneath.

Jules Van Liefferinge Secretaris-generaal
Nele Vanslembrouck Diensthoofd communicatie 
      <div class="vl-description-data">
    <div class="vl-grid vl-grid--is-stacked"><div class="vl-col--1-2 vl-col--1-1--xs">
          <span class="vl-description-data__data" itemprop="Person" itemtype="https://schema.org/Person">Jules Van Liefferinge</span>
          <span class="vl-description-data__subdata">Secretaris-generaal</span>
        </div><div class="vl-col--1-2 vl-col--1-1--xs">
          <span class="vl-description-data__data" itemprop="Person" itemtype="https://schema.org/Person">Nele Vanslembrouck</span>
          <span class="vl-description-data__subdata">Diensthoofd communicatie</span>
        </div></div>
  </div>
